description: This file is a BitBake recipe snippet/configuration for the GNU Compiler Collection (GCC), including setup, dependencies, settings, and functions for building GCC within the Yocto/OpenEmbedded build system.

methods.name: extract_stashed_builddir
methods.description: Copies the stashed build directory for GCC from source to destination using hard links.

methods.name: get_gcc_float_setting
methods.description: Determines the appropriate GCC float setting based on environment variables.

methods.name: get_gcc_mips_plt_setting
methods.description: Returns MIPS PLT setting if architecture and features match.

methods.name: get_gcc_ppc_plt_settings
methods.description: Returns PowerPC secure PLT setting based on architecture and features.

methods.name: get_gcc_multiarch_setting
methods.description: Returns multiarch target options based on architecture and features.

methods.name: get_tune_parameters
methods.description: Generates tune-specific compilation and feature parameters for multilib setup.
